name: open-secret-santa
description: A client-side Secret Santa gift exchange organizer with no backend

scripts.validate:all: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run validate:i18n
scripts.cap:sync: npm run cap:copy-web && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:copy-web: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && cp index.html www/ && cp -r js styles locales assets www/
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run android
